title: Urn On Pedestal, mid-18th century
description: A, B pair of urns with gadrooned, flaring body on domed base with oblique gadrooning. C, D Square, tapering pedestals with molding at base and upper edge. All four pieces decorated with sprays of flowers in delicate colors. Urns glued to pedestals.

tombstone.epitaph:
Urn On Pedestal, mid-18th century. Soft-paste porcelain, over-glaze decoration. 
1958-39-1-b,d.
